title: Experiential Learning-Based Educational Program for Preventing Occupational Injuries in Massage Therapists

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Video Viewing and Practice-Centered Educational Environment Based on Smartphone Learning

learning_goals: Correctly apply ergonomic postures in massage procedures for over 80% of sessions within two weeks
Identify at least three occupational injury risk factors and propose improvement plans by week 4
Document at least two real-world application examples of learning content in reflective journals after experiential learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
